data.name: Engines Of Destruction
data.detailed_description:
Currently in development; Engines of Destruction is a large scale tactical, PvP, FPS with a central focus on mechs, communication and combined arms combat.

Set in a near future dystopia, in the wake of a failed alien invasion; the game focuses on conflict between private military companies and independent factions. These groups fight enormous battles over precious resources, on several sprawling terrains using a huge variety of equipment.

Features:
- Pilot enormous mechs.
- Engage in detailed infantry combat.
- Talk to your teammates with simulated radio communication.
- Customise your infantry and mech loadouts.
- Drive cars, IFVs, APCs and other vehicles.
- Pilot helicopters and planes on a large battlefield.
- Mod support
- Fight in many gamemodes or create your own in the editor.

data.short_description: Currently in development; EOD is a large-scale, tactical, combined-arms, PvP, FPS, featuring mechs and an emphasis on a wide variety of game modes, from realistic to casual. This game will feature full support for community servers and mods.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I7 6500U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 TI 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 5950X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 12GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
